    • Bear

      public Bear(itumulator.world.World world, boolean isAdult, itumulator.world.Location location)
      This constructor is used when creating a bear normally.
      Parameters:
      world - The simulation world.
      isAdult - Whether to spawn the bear as an adult or baby.
      location - Where to spawn it.

      world - The simulation world.
      isAdult - Whether to spawn the bear as an adult or baby.
      location - Where to spawn it.
      territory - Where to place its territory .

    • Bear

      This constructor is used when bears breed.
      Parameters:
      world - The simulation world.
      isAdult - Whether to spawn the bear as an adult or baby.
      location - Where to spawn it.
      territory - Where to place its territory .
      family - Their family members.

  • Method Details

    • findNearestBerryBush

      public BerryBush findNearestBerryBush()
      Finds the nearest non-depleted BerryBush within the bear's vision range.
      Returns:
      The nearest BerryBush, or null if none are found.

    • eatBerryBush

      public boolean eatBerryBush(BerryBush berryBush)
      Consumes berries from a BerryBush if the bear is at the same location as the bush.
      Parameters:
      berryBush - The BerryBush to consume berries from.
      Returns:
      True if berries were consumed, false otherwise.

    • interactWithBerryBush

      public void interactWithBerryBush()
      Handles the bear's interaction with a BerryBush: Finds the nearest BerryBush Moves toward it if not already there Eats it when at the same location
